title: TSQ LIVE: Adam Melchor in Times Square
description: Kick off the weekend with a free concert by indie artist Adam Melchor, part of the TSQ LIVE series.
aiSummary: Free Friday concert in Times Square featuring Adam Melchor. A sound-rich kickoff to NYC's weekend flow.
studioNotes: Capture reflections off buildings; place omni mic near bleachers for balanced crowd+music.
